title: East Road Quest - Novel Updates
author: YoonHyunSeung   윤현승
description:
The master of the book of Holy Scriptures.
'You will be the one that will die. Tell me your name, devil.'

A strong youth who had been sealed for the past 500 years, Ruby.
'I don't want to be an angel anymore, I will be a devil.'

And the girl with horns who has the power of healing magic, Sahp. 
'What if he is a devil?'

The party travels east on a quest to find the Holy Grail.>
